title: Mace
desc:
Post 137
- Choose a player, make them draw 3 cards and anyone neighboring them in the order list draws 1.
- Maximum of 1 global use per game, other Maces drawn or owned get turned into <:red:1106234051129507932> 2.
- Gives user a <:red:1106234051129507932> 2 after being used.
- Bionic cannot use this card on Spaggy Aka Psycho.
